name: Battlemage I
desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Armor and 15 Ability Power.

name: Blue Battery I
desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 10 Mana.

name: Shrug It Off
desc: Bruisers regenerate 2.5% of their maximum Health each second. Gain a Sejuani.

name: Celestial Blessing I
desc: Your units heal for 12% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 250 Health.

name: Cybernetic Implants I
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 100 Health and 8 Attack Damage.

name: Cybernetic Shell I
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 100 Health and 20 Armor.

name: Cybernetic Uplink I
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 100 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

name: Exiles I
desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

name: Stand United I
desc: Your units gain 1 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Electrocharge I
desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

name: Featherweights I
desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 25% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

name: First Aid Kit
desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 25%.

name: Future Sight I
desc: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Zephyr.

name: Item Grab Bag I
desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

name: Luden's Echo I
desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 40-130 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

name: Makeshift Armor I
desc: Your units with no items gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Meditation I
desc: Your units without items equipped restore 4 Mana per second.

name: Knife's Edge I
desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Attack Damage.

name: Pandora's Items
desc: Gain a random component. At the start of each round, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

name: Recombobulator
desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions that cost 1 more. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

name: Second Wind I
desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

name: Thrill of the Hunt I
desc: Your units heal 400 Health on kill.

name: Tiny Titans
desc: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and has 130 maximum Health.

name: Built Different I
desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 250-400 Health and 30-75% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

name: TriForce I
desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 133 Health, 13 starting Mana, and 13% Attack Speed.

name: Double Trouble I
desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 20 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

name: AFK
desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

name: Assassin Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Assassin. Gain a Qiyana.

name: Astral Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Astral. Gain a Lux.

name: Axiom Arc I
desc: Your units gain 25 Mana on kill.

name: Band of Thieves I
desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

name: Best Friends I
desc: Your units that start combat only adjacent to each other gain 10% Attack Speed and 15 Armor.

name: Big Friend
desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 2000 Health take 10% less damage for the rest of combat.

name: Bruiser Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bruiser. Gain a Jax.

name: Cannoneer Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Cannoneer. Gain a Aphelios.

name: Cavalier Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Cavalier. Gain a Lillia.

name: Consistency
desc: Gain double streak gold.

name: Soul Siphon
desc: Darkflights benefit from the top-most trait of the sacrificed unit. This does not increase the trait count for that trait.

name: Darkflight Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Darkflight. Gain an Aphelios.

name: Dragonmancer Conference
desc: Every 2 rounds, a random Dragonmancer appears on your bench. Gain a Kai'Sa.

name: Evoker Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Evoker. Gain a Zyra.

name: Guardian Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Guardian. Gain a Zac.

name: Guild Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Guild. Gain a Twitch.

name: Lagoon Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Lagoon. Gain a Kai'Sa.

name: Lategame Specialist
desc: Gain 40 gold when you reach Level 9.

name: Mage Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mage. Gain a Lillia.

name: Mirage Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mirage. Gain a Yone.

name: Mystic Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mystic. Gain a Rakan.

name: Pandora's Bench
desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every turn, Champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

name: Preparation I
desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 25, 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 4 times.

name: Ragewing Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ragewing. Gain a Rakan.

name: Scalescorn Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scalescorn. Gain a Braum.

name: Shapeshifter Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shapeshifter. Gain a Gnar.

name: Shimmerscale Crest
desc: Gain a Shimmerscale Emblem and a Jax.

name: Swiftshot Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Swiftshot. Gain a Twitch.

name: Tempest Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Tempest. Gain a Qiyana.

name: Warrior Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Warrior. Gain a Yone.

name: Whispers Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Whispers. Gain a Zyra.

name: Ascension
desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

name: Smoke Bomb
desc: The first time Assassins drops to 70% health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding all negative effects. Any excess damage is reduced by 60%. Gain a Talon.

name: Battlemage II
desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Armor and 25 Ability Power.

name: Calculated Loss
desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

name: Celestial Blessing II
desc: Your units heal for 20% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 350 Health.

name: Clear Mind
desc: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of a round, gain 3 experience points.

name: Component Grab Bag
desc: Gain 3 random item components.

name: Cybernetic Implants II
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and 15 Attack Damage.

name: Cybernetic Shell II
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and 30 Armor.

name: Cybernetic Uplink II
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and restore 3 Mana per second.

name: Exiles II
desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 35% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

name: Stand United II
desc: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Electrocharge II
desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 85-145 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

name: Featherweights II
desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 35% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

name: Hustler
desc: If you have less than 20 gold at the end of a round, gain 2 gold.

name: Jeweled Lotus
desc: Magic and true damage from your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 25% Critical Strike Chance.

name: Luden's Echo II
desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 55-160 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

name: Makeshift Armor II
desc: Your units with no items gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Meditation II
desc: Your units without items equipped restore 6 Mana per second.

name: Knife's Edge II
desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Attack Damage.

name: Metabolic Accelerator
desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PVP round.

name: Portable Forge
desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

name: Rich Get Richer
desc: Gain 10 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

name: Rich Get Richer+
desc: Gain 15 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

name: Salvage Bin
desc: Gain a random completed item. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

name: Second Wind II
desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

name: Sunfire Board
desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 10% of their maximum Health over 20 seconds and reduce healing received by 50%.

name: Phony Frontline
desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

name: Three's Company
desc: Gain 3 random 3-cost champions.

name: Thrill of the Hunt II
desc: Your units heal 700 Health on kill.

name: Ancient Archives I
desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits.

name: Trade Sector
desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

name: Trade Sector+
desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 8 golds.

name: Built Different II
desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-525 Health and 50-80% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

name: TriForce II
desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 233 Health, 23 starting Mana, and 23% Attack Speed.

name: True Twos
desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

name: Double Trouble II
desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 30 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

name: Assassin Crest
desc: Gain an Assassin Emblem and a Qiyana.

name: Intercosmic Gifts
desc: Astral Orbs have a 100% chance to spawn a smaller orb that contains bonus loot. Gain a Lux.

name: Protectors of the Cosmos
desc: Combat start: Your team gains a 35 Health shield for every item component equipped on an Astral Champion, including those that are part of a full item. Gain a Lux.

name: Axiom Arc II
desc: Your units gain 40 Mana on kill.

name: Best Friends II
desc: Your units that start combat only adjacent to each other gain 20% Attack Speed and 25 Armor.

name: Big Friend II
desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1650 Health take 18% less damage for the rest of combat.

name: Combat Training
desc: Your Champions permanently gain 1 Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy unit. Champions start with 8 Attack Damage.

name: Bruiser Crest
desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Jax.

name: Personal Training
desc: At the end of combat, Champions that started combat adjacent to Bruiser permanently gain 30 Health, increased by 20 if they survived. Gain a Jax.

name: Titanic Strength
desc: Bruisers gain 1.5% of their Health as Attack Damage. Gain a Tahm Kench.

name: Cannoneer Crest
desc: Gain a Cannoneer Emblem and a Aphelios.

name: Hot Shot
desc: Cannoneer's cannon shots burn their targets, dealing 8% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 2 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn. Gain a Tristana.

name: Ricochet
desc: Cannoneer's cannon shots bounce once, dealing 40% less damage. Gain a Aphelios.

name: Devastating Charge
desc: Cavalier's first attack after charging deals 80 magic damage, increased by 1% for each Armor and Magic Resist they have. Gain a Rell.

name: Cavalier Crest
desc: Gain a Cavalier Emblem and a Sejuani.

name: Cluttered Mind
desc: If your bench is full at the end of a round, gain 3 experience points.

name: Darkflight Crest
desc: Gain a Darkflight Emblem and a Rell.

name: Dragon Imperialist
desc: If you only have 1 Dragon, Dragons execute enemies they damage who are below 18% Health. Gain a Nomsy.

name: Dragonmancer Crest
desc: Gain a Dragonmancer Emblem and an   Kai'sa.

name: Hero-In-Training
desc: The Dragonmancer nearest to the Dragonmancer Hero gains 66% of the Dragonmancer trait's bonuses. Gain a Sett.

name: Inspire
desc: When the Dragonmancer Hero gets a takedown, champions that share a trait with the Dragonmancer Hero gain 70% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Gain a Ashe.

name: Evoker Crest
desc: Gain an Evoker Emblem and a Zyra.

name: First Aid Kit II
desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

name: Gadget Expert
desc: Direct Damage items deal 25% more damage as true damage. Gain a Statikk Shiv.

name: Guardian Crest
desc: Gain a Guardian Emblem and a Zac.

name: Heroic Presence
desc: Guardians taunt all enemies every 2 seconds. Enemies that attack a Guardian's shield take magic damage equal to 7% of the shielded unit's max Health (up to once per second). Gain a Braum.

name: Guild Crest
desc: Gain a Guild Emblem and a Twitch.

name: Gear Upgrades
desc: Guild champions holding an item gain 25 Armor and another 250% of their Guild bonus. Gain a Twitch.

name: Loot Master
desc: Gain a random component every 4 player combat rounds when you have at least Guild (2) active. Gain a Twitch.

name: Eternal Protection
desc: When one of your Jade champions would die, the nearest Jade Statue protects them, losing 70% of its max Health and transferring 200% of that amount to the champion.. Gain an Jax.

name: Penitence
desc: Enemies are disarmed for 2.5 seconds the first time they attack a Jade Statue or are damaged by a Jade Statue's explosion. Gain a Gnar.

name: Jade Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Jade. Gain a Gnar.

name: Lagoon Crest
desc: Gain a Lagoon Emblem and a Zac.

name: High Tide
desc: Until they cast 2 times, Lagoon champions have 30% reduced Attack Speed but gain 12 Mana per second. Gain a Kai'sa.

name: Oasis
desc: When Lagoon champions gain a shield, they remove all negative effects on themselves and heal for 18% of their missing Health. Gain a Zac.

name: Last Stand
desc: The first time you would die, instead drop to 1 Health. After this effect triggers, your units gain 200 Health, 20 Armor and Magic Resist, and 20% Omnivamp.

name: Mage Conference
desc: While the Mage trait is active, a random Mage portals onto your bench after combat with a player. Gain a Lillia.

name: Mage Crest
desc: Gain a Mage Emblem and a Vladimir.

name: Essence Theft
desc: Mages' attacks drain 8 Mana from their target and gain 4 of the drained Mana. Gain a Lux.

name: Better Together
desc: Aura items that buff your team have their effects increased by 33%. Gain a Locket of the Iron Solari

name: Mirage Crest
desc: Gain a Mirage Emblem and a Nunu.

name: Hallucinate
desc: Mirage champions take 90% less damage for the first 6 seconds of combat. Gain a Yone.

name: Preparation II
desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35, 4 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 4 times.

name: Ragewing Crest
desc: Gain a Ragewing Emblem and a Sena.

name: Scorch
desc: Every 5th instance of Ragewing champion's damage deals 33% more damage and is converted to true damage. Gain a Kayn.

name: Tantrum
desc: After casting their first Ability, Ragewings restore 100% of their maximum Rage.

name: Base Camp
desc: Scalescorns gain 7% damage each time they start combat in the same hex, stacking up to 4 times. Gain a Lillia.

name: Scalescorn Crest
desc: Gain a Scalescorn Emblem and a Braum.

name: Scoped Weapons I
desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +1 Attack Range and 15% Attack Speed.

name: Beast's Den
desc: Units that start combat next to at least 2 Shapeshifters gain 25% Attack Speed and Move Speed. Shapeshifters always gain this bonus. Gain a Gnar.

name: Reckless Spending
desc: If you purchase both XP and a Shop Refresh during the Planning Phase, Shimmerscale champions and Champions having a Shimmerscale item gain 40% damage for the next combat phase. Gain a Jax.

name: Shimmerscale Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shimmerscale. Gain a Jax.

name: Swiftshot Crest
desc: Gain a Swiftshot Emblem and a Twitch.

name: Press the Attack
desc: Your Swiftshots' attacks apply a stack on their target for 5 seconds. Every third stack consumes all stacks to deal true damage equal to 5% of the target's maximum Health. Gain a Twitch.

name: Tempest Crest
desc: Gain a Tempest Emblem and a Qiyana.

name: Eye of the Storm
desc: At the start of combat, the unit in the center of the board gains 45 Ability Power, increased to 135 after Tempest lightning strikes. Gain a Qiyana.

name: Warrior Crest
desc: Gain a Warrior Emblem and a Yone.

name: Tiamat
desc: Warrior's additional attacks deal 50% of their damage to enemies in a 1-hex area around their target. Gain a Yone.

name: Whispers Crest
desc: Gain a Whispers Emblem and a Zyra.

name: Terrify
desc: Your units take 15% less damage from enemies shrunken by Whispers champions. Gain a Sylas.

name: Dragon Soul
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Dragon. Gain a Zippy and a Gargoyle Stoneplate.

name: Band of Thieves II
desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

name: BattlemageIII
desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Armor and 35 Ability Power.

name: Binary Airdrop
desc: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat.

name: Blue Battery II
desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 20 Mana.

name: Celestial Blessing III
desc: Your units heal for 35% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 450 Health.

name: Cybernetic Implants III
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 250 Health and 25 Attack Damage.

name: Cybernetic Shell III
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 250 Health and 40 Armor.

name: Cybernetic Uplink III
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 250 Health and restore 4 Mana per second.

name: Exiles III
desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 50% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

name: Stand United III
desc: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Electrocharge III
desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 115-235 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

name: Featherweights III
desc: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 60% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

name: New Recruit
desc: Gain +1 maximum team size.

name: Future Sight II
desc: Know who you fight next. Gain a Radiant Zephyr.

name: Golden Ticket
desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 50% chance to gain a free refresh.

name: High Roller
desc: Gain 3 Loaded Dice and 8 gold.

name: Item Grab Bag II
desc: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Reforgers.

name: Luden's Echo III
desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 90-240 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

name: Makeshift Armor III
desc: Your units with no items gain 65 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Meditation III
desc: Your units without items equipped restore 8 Mana per second.

name: Knife's Edge III
desc: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 40 Attack Damage.

name: Radiant Relics
desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 5 unique Radiant items.

name: March of Progress
desc: Gain 5 bonus experience points per round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

name: The Golden Egg
desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 11 turns. If you won vs player, receive bonus turn.

name: Wise Spending
desc: Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

name: Built Different III
desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 350-650 Health and 50-95% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

name: Tri Force III
desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 333 Health, 33 starting Mana, and 33% Attack Speed.

name: Double Trouble III
desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 40 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

name: Verdant Veil
desc: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 20 seconds of combat.

name: Windfall
desc: Gain 20 gold.

name: Windfall+
desc: Gain 35 gold.

name: Windfall++
desc: Gain 40 gold.

name: Woodland Charm
desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. Clones cannot hold items.

name: Age of Dragons
desc: If you only have Dragons, every 5th attack from a Dragon fires a Dragonsoul blast that deals magic damage equal to 15% of their target's max Health. Gain a Nomsy, Zippy, and a random Tier 4 Dragon.

name: Assassin Crown
desc: Gain an Assassin Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Diana.

name: Part Time Assassins
desc: The Assassin trait grants its bonuses to your champions that start combat in the back 2 rows. This does not increase your number of Assassins. Gain a Qiyana.

name: Best Friends III
desc: Your units that start combat only adjacent to each other gain 20% Attack Speed and 35 Armor.

name: Birthday Present
desc: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1). Gain additional 1 gold every time you level up.

name: Bruiser Crown
desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Redemption, and an Sylas.

name: Cannoneer Crown
desc: Gain a Cannoneer Emblem, a Runaan's Hurricane, and a Aphelios.

name: Cavalier Crown
desc: Gain a Cavalier Emblem, a Redemption, and a Nunu.

name: Cavalier Unity
desc: The Cavalier trait grants its bonuses to all of your Champions. This does not increase your number of Cavaliers. Gain a Sejuani.

name: Cursed Crown
desc: Gain +2 maximum team size, but take 100% increased player damage.

name: Darkflight Crown
desc: Gain a Darkflight Emblem, a Titan's Resolve, and an Rengar.

name: Dragonmancer Crown
desc: Gain a Dragonmancer Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Lee Sin.

name: Evoker Crown
desc: Gain an Evoker Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and an Seraphine.

name: Guardian Crown
desc: Gain a Guardian Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, and a Braum.

name: Guild Crown
desc: Gain a Guild Emblem, a Giant Slayer and a Twitch.

name: Jade Soul
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Jade. Gain an Titan's Resolve and a Gnar.

name: Lagoon Crown
desc: Gain a Lagoon Emblem, a Spear of Shojin and a Zeri.

name: Living Forge
desc: Gain a random Ornn item now and after every 10 player combats.

name: Lucky Gloves
desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions items that they can use well. Gain a Thief's Gloves.

name: Mage Crown
desc: Gain a Mage Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Lux.

name: Mirage Crown
desc: Gain a Mirage Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Nunu.

name: Mystic Soul
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mystic. Gain a Spear of Shojin and a Rakan.

name: Preparation III
desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50, 7 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 4 times.

name: Ragewing Soul
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ragewing. Gain a Guinsoo's Rageblade and a Rakan.

name: Cruel Pact
desc: Buying XP costs 6 Health instead of gold. But Heal 3 Health after a round.

name: Scalescorn Crown
desc: Gain a Scalescorn Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Diana.

name: Scoped Weapons II
desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range.

name: Shapeshifter Soul
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shapeshifter. Gain a Sunfire Cape and an Gnar.

name: Shimmerscale Soul
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shimmerscale. Gain a Titan's Resolve and a Volibear.

name: Swiftshot Crown
desc: Gain a Swiftshot Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Varus.

name: Tempest Crown
desc: Gain a Tempest Emblem, a Statikk Shiv, and a Lee Sin.

name: Think Fast
desc: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 8 gold.

name: Ancient Archives II
desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits.

name: Urf's Grab Bag II
desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item components.

name: Warrior Crown
desc: Gain a Warrior Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and an Yone.

name: Whispers Crown
desc: Gain a Whispers Emblem, a Titan's Resolve, and an Sylas.
